tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RegulatoryChanges (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  regulatory_body VARCHAR(255),
  regulation_change_date DATE,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    change_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES companies(company_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (change_id) REFERENCES regulatory_changes(change_id)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    change_id INT,
    compliance_status TEXT,
    compliance_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES companies(company_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (change_id) REFERENCES regulatory_changes(change_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    company_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES companies(company_id)
);
